an4.22:1.4: netaṃ → metaṃ (si, sya-all, km, mr); ne (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an4.22:2.2: nayime → na vatime (bj); nacayime (sya-all, km); na vata me (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an4.22:4.4: sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj); sātthā savyañjanā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ → kevalaparipuṇṇā (bj) | dhātā → dhatā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an4.22:6.3: Saññato dhīro dhammesu → saññato dhīradhammesu (bj); saṃyutto thiradhammesu (sya-all, km)
